song.englishname: Chapstick, Chaped Lips And Things Like Chemistry

english.segment1: ok, so, who doesn't own a cell phone. who brought back their permission slip. because i know nobody wants to stay home. while the rest of us go out and make a day of it
english.segment2: cause theme parks are so much more fun when the sun's outside. and i lost my phone to the lake beneath the batman ride
english.segment3: they're starting something, and i don't want to begin it. they're looking for trouble, but with me it won't be found. and i regret that i'm completely out of daytime minutes. and so i guess i'll have to wait a lot till 8 o'clock comes around
english.segment4: ok, so, who doesn't own a cell phone. well i don't need to ask my friends. because i know mine was fastened to my jawbone. thanks to all those nights and weekends
english.segment5: cause theme parks are so much more fun when the sun's outside. and i lost my phone to the lake beneath the batman ride
english.segment6: they're starting something, and i don't want to begin it. they're looking for trouble, but with me it won't be found. and i regret that i'm completely out of daytime minutes. and so i guess i'll have to wait a lot till 8 o'clock comes around
english.segment7: when it comes to relationships i'm the dumbest one. and i don't mean just with girls, i mean with everyone. your illustrations always point out just what's wrong with me. it's chapstick, and chapped lips, and things like chemistry
english.segment8: it's chapstick, and chapped lips, and things like. it's chapstick, and chapped lips, and things like. it's chapstick, and chapped lips, and things like chemistry
english.segment9: can i relate to you the way you relate to me. can you help me out with my chemistry. i don't want to be precieved the way i am. i just want to be percieved the way i am
